name: Garden Guardians (williamdual, SakuraDemon, Pufblon, GatesStudios)
description:
Garden Guardians is a fresh and juicy tower defense game that will make you say bon appétit! Grow your crops, combine them into stunning (and effective) dishes, and may the odds be ever in your flavor!

Left Click: Build and upgrade towers, interact with UI

Right Click: Move Player to pick up resources and stall enemies

NOTE: Download and run the .exe file for a better experience!
